floating on water: keep afloat You can keep afloat for longer if you lie on your back.stay afloat He managed to stay afloat by holding on to the side of the boat. She spent seven days afloat on a raft.
having enough money to pay what you owe: keep afloat The business had to sell off some of its assets to keep afloat.stay afloat Many small businesses are struggling to stay afloat.
